content.body: No; we discussed the issue and agreed to move forward with a PR, but the actual PR has not received TG2 consensus

content.body: does anyone understand why Frank objected to https://github.com/tc39/ecma402/pull/729 ? It corrects a spec bug to align with external and implementation reality, does so by changing two characters (`-0` to `1`), and has been up to look at for two weeks.
